New Records: Ben Duckett scored 107 runs from 91 balls
Harry Brook moved past Virat Kohli for the most runs by a captain in an ODI series against Australia with 312 runs
Key Match Events: England collapse from 202-2 to 309 all out
Travis Head took career-best ODI figures of four for 28
Brydon Carse and Matthew Potts stepped up in this series overall
Post-Match Reflections: Mitch Marsh said he didn't really notice the time-wasting by England
Steve Smith said Australia have a lot of respect for England and the series was played in a good manner
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rain arrived three minutes too late to rescue England
Ben Duckett savoured his first century against Australia in any format
The series was played in a good manner
Others: The Australian team had to adapt to the conditions without their regular captain Jos Buttler
